definitions: A German-based animation studio and YouTube channel known for producing educational science videos.
The distinctive style or content characteristic of videos produced by the Kurzgesagt studio, often involving minimalist animation and a focus on complex scientific or philosophical topics.
examples: I learned about black holes from a Kurzgesagt video.
The new Kurzgesagt episode explained the concept of time dilation.
Many find the Kurzgesagt approach to science communication highly effective.
